summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Museum Development Authority; authorizing the City to provide a guaranty in support of not to exceed Thirty-three Million Dollars ($33,000,000) in tax-exempt bonds to be issued by the Authority, establishing the terms and conditions under which the City will provide such guaranty; and authorizing an agreement between the City and the Authority with regard to the Authority's issuance of the bonds and the City's guaranty.
